flavor: A member of House Deneith’s Defenders Guild, you gave up a life among the Blademarks to guard an important personage, such as a noble, a general, or the scion of another dragon marked house. Whom have you guarded, and did you ever come under attack? Were you on friendly terms with anyone you guarded? What events did you witness while acting as a bodyguard—including embarrassing, criminal, traitorous, or otherwise sinister deeds that only the bodyguard’s code of silence prevents you from revealing?
name: Deneith Bodyguard
